variants.Description in input context: Mutation in LRRK2 associated with Parkinson's disease.

Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 40% for the LRRK2 variant NM_000177404.4:c.XXXXX.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression between 80% and 120% of control

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 80% or greater than 120% of control.
